attributes.shortDescription: Beautiful set of 4 handcrafted ceramic coffee mugs with unique glazed finishes. Each mug holds 12oz and features an ergonomic handle design. Microwave and dishwasher safe. Perfect for morning coffee, afternoon tea, or as a thoughtful gift.
